title: Rhaly operators: more on generalized Ces\`aro operators
authors: Eva A. Gallardo-Guti\'errez and Jonathan R. Partington
abstract:
Rhaly operators, as generalizations of the Ces\`aro operator, are studied
from the standpoint of view of spectral theory and invariant subspaces,
extending previous results by Rhaly and Leibowitz to a framework where
generalized Ces\`aro operators arise naturally.
